ygData.subject: Re: /Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Raising from level 26
ygData.msgSnippet: Where can i find the bottle in Freeport? And is the latern casing at the Trader s Holiday in East Freeport?
ygData.messageBody:
Where can i find the bottle in Freeport? And is the latern casing at the
Trader's Holiday in East Freeport?


>From: tiggy <tiggy@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] /Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Raising from level 26
>Date: Tue, 29 Jun 1999 17:31:33 -0400
>
>From: tiggy <tiggy@...>
>
>Actually I am skill level 107 and lanterns are STILL not trivial for
>me...great CHEAP way to help work on your skill in between making banded.
>It takes one metal bit, lantern casing mold, one water, and a bottle.
>
>Twilite ;)
>Master Smith
>
>At 11:39 PM 6/28/99 CDT, you wrote:
> >From: Henning Seljenes <hseljenes@...>
> >
> >
> >Ok I started with the sharpening of weapons till level 26. I just started
> >making scalers today. I made attempts with 35 metal bits. So when you say
> >lanterns till 67, is that large lantern things? What do I need to make
> >those? (materials?).
> >
> >Irontoe (Xegony)
> >
> >>From: Chris Holko <cholko@...>
> >>Reply-To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> >>To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> >>Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Raising from level 26
> >>Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 07:49:09 -0400
> >>
> >>From: Chris Holko <cholko@...>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>Henning Seljenes wrote:
> >> >
> >> > From: Henning Seljenes <hseljenes@...>
> >> >
> >> > I can get to level 26 in smithing pretty easily. After this I have
>heard
> >>a
> >> > few ways to raise skills here. Skewers, (skalers?), or large
>lanterns.
> >>
> >>Scalers... lots of scalers... till about 30-35 in skill, then lanterns
> >>till 67... after that its skewers, or flubbing the simple banded...
> >>
> >>btw, I have 102 and still fail regularly with simple banded items... go
> >>figure.
> >>
